pl.touk.hades
Interface FailoverActivator

All Known Implementing Classes:
LoadFailoverActivator
public interface FailoverActivator

The class that controls the switching between the main and the failover data sources in a HaDataSource.

Author:
Michal Sokolowski

Method Summary
 void init(HaDataSource haDataSource)
          Associates the given HA data source with this failover activator and initializes this failover activator.
 boolean isFailoverActive()
          Returns true if failover is active and false otherwise.
 

Method Detail

isFailoverActive

boolean isFailoverActive()
Returns true if failover is active and false otherwise. This method controls the process of switching between tha main and the failover data sources contained inside the HA data source associated with this failover activator. For more details see methods HaDataSource.getConnection() and HaDataSource.getConnection(String, String) which invoke this method to learn whether failover is active or not.

Returns:
true if failover is active or false otherwise

init

void init(HaDataSource haDataSource)
Associates the given HA data source with this failover activator and initializes this failover activator. This method should not be invoked directly. It is invoked by haDataSource.init() as part of the association process that should be done as follows: 
 haDataSource.setFailoverActivator(thisFailoverActivator);
 haDataSource.init();
The purpose of this method is to give an implementation a chance to initialize itself whenever it is associated with a HA data source.

Parameters:
haDataSource - HA data source that should be associated with this failover activator
